business.headline: Sensex falls nearly 1,400 points, Nifty tumbles 350 points; HCLTech tanks 4%Sensex falls nearly 1,400 points, Nifty tumbles 350 points; HCLTech tanks 4%

Stock market crash: Why should investors watch out for rising volatility?The stock market fear index surged 10% on Tuesday as investors braced for the impact of US reciprocal tariffs, which are set to take effect from April 2.

Sensex down over 1,400 points: US tariff panic or other factors at play?Is the surrounding uncertainty reciprocal tariffs the only factor behind today's stock market bloodbath, or are other underlying issues driving the sharp correction? Read on to find out what's spooking Dalal Street investors.

Will EPFO raise claim withdrawal limit to Rs 5 lakh in April 2025? Check hereEPFO is planning to allow Provident Fund (PF) withdrawals via UPI and ATMs soon. This move will make it easier for members to withdraw their PF money without delays.

Ratan Tata's will includes a 'no-contest' clause: What does it mean?Ratan Tata dedicated most of his fortune, including his Tata Sons shares, to charity. However, he also ensured that his family, close friends, employees, and even his cherished pets were taken care of.

10 major financial rule changes from April 1: Tax, UPI updates and moreFrom April 1, you won't have to pay income tax if your annual income is up to Rs 12 lakh. Also, with a standard deduction of Rs 75,000, income up to Rs 12.75 lakh is tax-free under the new tax system.

Ratan Tata's Rs 3,800 crore will: Who gets what?Ratan Tata will: The industrialist, who died on October 9, 2024, left most of his wealth, including shares in Tata Sons, to charitable causes. At the same time, he did not forget his family, close friends, staff, and even his beloved pets.
Commercial LPG cylinder prices slashed by Rs 41 from todayWhile the price of commercial LPG cylinders has been reduced, the price of domestic cylinders used by households has not changed.

Explained: Why Vodafone Idea shares hit 10% upper circuit todayVodafone Idea share price: The stock has gained 4.47% in the past five days and 0.27% over the past month. However, it remains 26.45% lower over the past six months and has dropped 46.57% in the last year.

Infosys, TCS, HCLTech: Why are IT stocks down today?Shares of IT companies such as Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), Infosys and HCLTech took a big hit during intraday trade. Infosys was down over 2.3%, while HCLTech and TCS fell as much as 1.7% at around 10:10 am.

Ola Electric shares gain 2% after update on March vehicle registrationsOla Electric shares were trading 2.15% higher at Rs 54.11 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) at around 9:55 am. The jump in its share price came after the company said there had been an improvement in vehicles registered in March.

Sensex crashes 1,400 points. What's behind the stock market bloodbath?Stock market crash: The Sensex and Nifty fell sharply as investors on Dalal Street are worried about the impact of US reciprocal tariffs, which will take effect on April 2.

entertainment.headline: 24 cuts in Mohanlal's Empuraan, villain's name changed in revised versionA total of 24, not 17, cuts have been suggested for the Prithviraj directorial, L2: Empuraan, which stars Mohanlal in a pivotal role. The film is currently running successfully in cinemas.

First Copy: Teaser of Munawar Faruqui's debut show outThe teaser of First Copy, featuring Munawar Faruqui, is out, and it is set to premiere on Amazon MX Player. The series explores the 90s film industry's piracy world, with Faruqui playing the lead role of Arif, a piracy mastermind.

Dharmendra undergoes successful cataract surgery, assures fans: I'm strongLegendary actor Dharmendra has successfully undergone cataract surgery, with a viral video showing him in high spirits. Fans have flooded social media with well wishes, praising his resilience.

Malaika Arora wants to do classical dance in films: Would love to try BharatanatyamMalaika Arora wishes to perform Bharatanatyam in films. She said she has never explored classical Indian dance on-screen. The Hip-Hop India 2 judge also spoke about stepping out of her comfort zone.

House of Dragon 3 is now in productionThe makers of HBO's House of Dragon recently confirmed that the third season of the show is currently in production. The show, based on George RR Martin's novels, will consist of four seasons.

Yaariyan actor Himansh Kohli hospitalised, says 'never take health for granted'Yaariyan actor Himansh Kohli shared a hospital video, revealing a tough 15-day health battle. He thanked loved ones for support and urged fans to prioritise health. The Yaariyaan actor assured he would bounce back soon.

Malayalam actor Asif Ali reacts to Empuraan controversy: View cinema as cinemaMalayalam actor Asif Ali was asked about the ongoing controversy over the depiction of riot scenes in Mohanlal's L2: Empuraan. He also addressed the issue of the film being re-edited and online trolling on Mohanlal.

Abir Gulaal: Fawad Khan returns to Bollywood with Vaani Kapoor in romantic rolePakistan's heartthrob Fawad Khan is all set to grace Indian cinemas once again with the romantic drama, Abir Gulaal, where he will be seen sharing screen space with Vaani Kapoor.

Cine body slams personal attacks on Mohanlal, Prithviraj amid L2 Empuraan rowThe Film Employees Federation of Kerala (FEFKA) has condemned social media attacks on filmmaker Prithviraj Sukumaran and superstar Mohanlal amid Empuraan controversy. They emphasised the importance of constructive criticism and solidarity with L2: Empuraan's creators.

The Beatles franchise cast announced: Paul Mescal, Barry Keoghan to headlineAcclaimed director Sam Mendes has announced the cast for his Beatles biopic series set for a 2028 premiere. The project promises a fresh perspective on the Fab Four, with each film focusing on a different band member.

UK PM announces Adolescence screening in schools, endorses the show's psychologyThe UK PM, Keir Starmer, announced that the Netflix show 'Adolescence' will be made available for streaming in schools. He took the decision after a discussion with the show's producers and co-creator Jack Thorne, among others.
Inside Tamannaah Bhatia's joyful Navratri celebration with Rasha ThadaniTamannaah Bhatia hosted a Mata Ki Chowki at home, dancing and praying with Rasha Thadani. Videos of the event went viral.

Spider-Man Beyond the Spider-Verse locks release date, to swing into cinemas in 2027The animated sequel Spider-Man Beyond the Spider-Verse is scheduled to hit theaters on June 4, 2027. Fans are thrilled with the announcement and eagerly await more plot details.

Director Hansal Mehta says he is 'fond' of Kangana Ranaut: We did not get alongHansal Mehta and Kangana Ranaut, who once collaborated on the film Simran, have had a tumultuous relationship marked by public disagreements. However, Mehta mainatained that he is fond of the actor.

Empuraan producer says not isolating Prithviraj, deleted 2 minutes of footageEmpuraan producer Antony Perumbavoor met the media in Kochi on Tuesday. He said that Mohanlal and everyone knew about the film's content before release and that they did not make edits due to external pressure.

Spider-Man Brand New Day: 4th instalment of Tom Holland film gets official titleThe fourth Spider-Man film, titled Spider-Man: Brand New Day, was officially announced at CinemaCon by director Destin Daniel Cretton. The filming is set to start later this summer.

Ekta Kapoor says Naagin 7 is 'coming soon', fans say 'give us a promo already'Producer Ekta Kapoor told the fans on Eid that 'Naagin 7' is in the works, and she will share a legit update soon. Fans asked her to stop with these announcements and share the promo already.

Kerala BJP leader calls Prithviraj's wife urban Naxal amid Empuraan controversyAmid the ongoing controversy surrounding Mohanlal-starrer 'L2: Empuraan', Kerala BJP leader B Gopalakrishnan labelled Prithviraj Sukumaran's wife an 'Urban Naxal' and criticised his mother.

AbRam, Suhana, Navya and others seen outside stadium after MI's win over KKRShah Rukh Khan's children, AbRam, Suhana Khan, her friends, Navya Naveli and several other star kids attended the MI vs KKR match held on March 31 in Mumbai. Shahid Kapoor and Mira Rajput were seen at the stadium as well.

general news.headline: Opposition walkout excuse to avoid debate: Kiren Rijiju on Waqf bill showdownWaqf bill row: A teaser of the probable showdown over the Waqf bill was seen on Tuesday after the opposition walked out of the business advisory committee (BAC) meeting chaired by the Speaker.

Shocks our conscience: Court raps UP over demolitions, orders Rs 10 lakh compensationThe Supreme Court pointed out that the Uttar Pradesh government was being ordered to pay compensation, considering the 'inhuman and illegal manner' in which the demolitions were carried out.

Kunal Kamra's caustic 'how to kill an artist democratically' post amid joke rowAmid the controversy over his remarks against Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde, Kunal Kamra listed the tactics used to silence artists who dare to speak truth to power.

Will Annamalai be the biggest loser if BJP, AIADMK tie up?The BJP and the AIADMK are reported to be in talks for an alliance ahead of the Assembly elections in Tamil Nadu in 2026. Annamalai has defined the Tamil Nadu BJP's image and narrative in recent years, and a deal might reduce his role. Will he emerge as the biggest loser or is there more to the story?

CAG flags faulty air monitoring stations, shortage of public transportThe CAG report on 'Prevention of Air Pollution from Vehicles' was tabled by Delhi Chief Minister Rekha Gupta in the Assembly on Tuesday.
India's earthquake time bomb: Are we prepared for a Myanmar-like disaster?A "Great Himalayan Earthquake" with magnitude 8+ is overdue. It will happen. And it will be catastrophic.

17 killed in massive fire after blast at firecracker factory in GujaratPreliminary investigations suggest the fire was caused by a boiler explosion. Such was the intensity of the blast and the resulting blaze that some parts of the building collapsed.

Liver Doc calls biohacker Bryan Johnson a fraud. He hits backDr. Cyriac Abby Philips, known as The Liver Doc on X, has accused Bryan Johnson of scamming people with his longevity program called Blueprint.

University of Bath School of Management: A Pathway to Global Career SuccessBath's School of Management blends top academics, hands-on learning, and career support to help students secure jobs at leading global companies.

Might as well break up Bangladesh: Northeast leaders bash Yunus pitch to ChinaIn response, Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma labelled Muhammad Yunus's statement as "offensive and strongly condemnable", while Tipra Motha chief Pradyot Manikya called on the Centre to adopt a more aggressive stance.

Top court refuses to release Ranveer Allahbadia's passport until Latent probe endsYouTubers Ranveer Allahbadia and Ashish Chanchalani had filed a plea seeking the release of their passports amid the ongoing row over the last episode of 'India's Got Latent'.

Anant Ambani embarks on padyatra from Jamnagar to Dwarka to celebrate 30th birthdayAnant Ambani has been covering a distance of 10-12 kilometers every night under tight security, accompanied by Z-plus security and local police forces.

Amid PM Modi retirement claim, what Yogi Adityanath said about his political futureRegarding his political future, Yogi Adityanath played it close to the chest. He acknowledged that his time at the helm of UP comes with an expiry date but refused to elaborate on what's next for him.

Byju Raveendran's 'broke, not broken' post sparks fierce reactions on XIn a post on X, Byju Raveendran shared a throwback picture of himself as he vowed to revive his edtech company, Byjus. However, his post did not sit well with social media users.

Prince Andrew accuser reveals critical injuries in car crash: 4 days to liveThe 41-year-old Virginia Giuffre, who had previously alleged sexual trafficking by Jeffrey Epstein to Prince Andrew, revealed she was critically injured in a car accident, with doctors giving her "four days to live".

After DeepSeek R1, China might stun world with a nuclear game-chang​erChina recently shook the AI space with its DeepSeek R1. China's next surprise could be in the field of energy as it works to operationalise a fusion-fission reactor, the world's first, in the next five years. This is why its Xinghuo reactor could be a game-changer.

LSG vs PBKS Match Preview, IPL 2025: Rishabh Pant, Shreyas Iyer battle it outThe Lucknow Super Giants will welcome Punjab Kings to the Ekana stadium as the big-money men Rishabh Pant and Shreyas Iyer will battle it out. Which team will continue their momentum on the tricky wicket in Lucknow?

Hardik Pandya asked the team to raise intensity and be ruthless: Ryan RickeltonMumbai Indians' (MI) wicketkeeper batter Ryan Rickelton said that their captain Hardik Pandya, had asked the entire team to raise the intensity ahead of their fixture against Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR). MI beat Kolkata by 8 wickets to register first win of the season.

Ricketon reveals Ashwani Kumar's special trait: He's a lot quicker than he looksMumbai Indians wicketkeeper batter Ryan Rickelton revealed that their new bowler Ashwani Kumar is a lot quicker than people think of him to be. Ashwani registered match-winning figures of 4/24 in three overs on his debut.

Ravindra Jadeja's Insta story after CSK's loss to RR goes viral: Things will changeIPL 2025: A day after Chennai Super Kings flopped in Guwahati, Ravindra Jadeja shared an Instagram story, promising fans of a strong comeback. He shared a photo of himself and MS Dhoni from Sunday's defeat to Rajasthan Royals.

Rohit Sharma would be dropped from MI if not for his name: VaughanMichael Vaughan questioned Rohit Sharma's place in Mumbai Indians' lineup, stating that without his heritage-rich name and IPL legacy, his ongoing form would have seen him dropped. Vaughan highlights Rohit's lack of fifties and centuries in IPL as a major concern for MI.

Suryakumar Yadav becomes 5th Indian batter to hit 8000 T20 runsMumbai Indians batter Suryakumar Yadav joined an elite list during the team's match against KKR. Suryakumar reached 8000 T20 runs during his rapid 27* off 9 balls at the Wankhede Stadium.

Hardik Pandya, fans praise MI's scouting team: Better search engine than GoogleIPL 2025, MI vs KKR: Captain Hardik Pandya heaped praise on Mumbai Indians' scouting team after 23-year-old Ashwani Kumar shone on debut. The left-arm pacer is the latest in the assembly line of exciting talents unearthed by the five-time champions.

NFL: Elgton Jenkins moving to center for 2025, says Packers GMPackers GM Brian Gutekunst confirmed Elgton Jenkins will shift from guard to center, strengthening Green Bay's offensive line and providing stability for quarterback Jordan Love in the 2025 NFL season.

March Madness 2025: Flagg, Broome, Clayton lead star-studded final four clash between no. 1 seedsThe Final Four features top-seeded powerhouses as Auburn, Florida, Houston, and UConn battle for supremacy. Players like Flagg, Broome, and Clayton are set to shine on college basketball's biggest stage.

Suryakumar Yadav is a joke: Ryan Rickleton amazed with unreal shot vs KKRRyan Rickleton and Suryakumar Yadav's fiery partnership guided Mumbai Indians to a dominant win over Kolkata Knight Riders, with the latter's outrageous second-ball six leaving both his teammates and opponents stunned at the Wankhede Stadium.

NBA: Kevin Durant injured, Dillon Brooks ejected as Phoenix Suns fall to Houston Rockets in blowout lossThe Phoenix Suns' postseason hopes took a massive hit on Sunday night as all-star forward Kevin Durant suffered a left ankle injury during a game against the Houston Rockets on March 30 during a regular NBA game.

Debutant Ashwani Kumar fires as MI decimate KKR to open account in styleIPL 2025, MI vs KKR match report: Ashwani Kumar's four-wicket haul and Ryan Rickelton's unbeaten 62 helped Mumbai Indians hammer Kolkata Knight Riders by 8 wickets. The five-time champions won their first game of the season in style, making a big statement of intent.

Ashwani Kumar relishes dream IPL debut: 1 banana for lunch, 4 wickets for dinnerMumbai Indians' Ashwani Kumar bowled an incredible spell on debut at the Wankhede Stadium. Ashwani became the first ever Indian bowler to pick up 4 wickets in his debut match in the IPL. In the mid-innings interview, he revealed the nervy moments before the match.

MI's Ashwani Kumar becomes 1st Indian bowler to take 4 wickets on IPL debutIPL 2025, MI vs KKR: Left-arm fast bowler Ashwani Kumar became the first Indian man in the history of the Indian Premier League to take more than 3 wickets on debut in the tournament. He rattled Kolkata Knight Riders at the Wankhede Stadium on Monday, March 31.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
